title: Peshawar BRT revolutionizes public transport system: PM
content:
Prime Minister Imran Khan Friday said Peshawar Bus Rapid Transit had revolutionised public transport system in the city and since the start of its operations in August 2020 more than 71 million people had travelled in it.
In a tweet on social media platform Twitter, he said, “Over 250,000 commuters ride it on daily basis out of which 20% are women and 60% are from low-income groups.”
“Congratulations to KP govt. Peshawar BRT recognised as a Gold Standard BRT service by the International Technical Standard Committee of the BRT scoring a 97 out of 100 – meaning it is consistent in almost all respects with international best practices,” he added.
